title: Maximum Height
text: The ball reaches the maximum height at the vertex of the parabola.

title: Calculating x-value of Vertex
text: To calculate at what time the maximum height is reached, find the x-coordinate of the vertex with the formula $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$.

title: Units
text: Since the ball is thrown at a speed of $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$, the maximum height is reached at some number of seconds as the unit.
